description: This file is a shell script that performs network connectivity diagnostics and self-healing actions such as ping tests, DNS resolution tests, and reboots of the router device. It includes functions to run periodic tests, determine when a reset is needed, and execute those resets based on system configuration.

methods.name: getCorrectiveActionState
methods.description: Retrieves the current corrective action state from system configuration.

methods.name: calcRandTimetoStartPing
methods.description: Calculates a random delay time before starting ping tests.

methods.name: resetRouter
methods.description: Commands the router to reboot via simulated device control command.

methods.name: resetNeeded
methods.description: Determines if a reset is necessary based on the process and initiates a reset.

methods.name: runDNSPingTest
methods.description: Performs a DNS resolution test and triggers corrective actions if needed.

methods.name: runPingTest
methods.description: Performs network reachability ping tests and triggers resets upon failure.
